definitions.definition: A part of a helmet , arranged so as to lift or open, and so show the face. The openings for seeing and breathing are generally in it.
The fore piece of a cap, projecting over, and protecting the eyes.
A rigid adjustable flap on an automobile windshield that can shield the eyes of a driver from direct sunlight or glare.

main_definition: A part of a helmet , arranged so as to lift or open, and so show the face. The openings for seeing and breathing are generally in it.
